These are the private pages of the 7Cogs Organization, which means that only members of this organization can see them and by default, only the Organization Administrator can edit them. To define a more advanced permission system, other Organization Roles can be created in the Control Panel

In Liferay you can create as many organizations and communities as you want and each will have its own public and private pages. Public pages can be used for a public website as anybody can see them. Private pages can be used for an intranet as only the members belonging to that organization or community can see them.
